lore.block.aether_crystallium.quicksoil_: A building block that is created by combining Holystone and Quicksoil that is exactly as slippery as Quicksoil.
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.aether_cac: A spiky plant found in the Quicksoil Desert. It is also a great source for Lime Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.purple_aet: A nice decoration block found on top of Giant Aether Cacti .It is also a great source for Purple Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.enchanted_: The enchanted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Libraries
lore.block.aether_crystallium.blighted_s: The blighted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Laboratories
lore.block.aether_crystallium.crystal_go: A shiny ore found in the underground of the Aether. It is has various different uses.
A very shiny block crafted from 9 Crystal Gold Ore Ingots.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.raw_crysta: A block compacted out of 9 pieces of Raw Crystal Gold.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.frostpine_: The log of a tree found in a very cold region of the Aether, the Frostpines. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Frostpine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_f: A Frostpine Log that had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Frostpine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.frostpine_: A building block crafted from Frostpine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Frostpine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_f: A building block crafted from Stripped Frostpine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Frostpine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.frostpine_: Frostpine Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Frostpine Logs, and make a great building material.
These leaves generate with Frostpine Trees. They can drop Frostpine Saplings when decaying.
These small blue saplings will grow into Frostpine Trees. They can be grown faster with Bonemeal.
Crafted from Frostpine Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Frostpine Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
Crafted from Frostpine Planks and Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Sticks and Frostpine Planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
Crafted from Frostpine Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Frostpine Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Frostpine Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Frostpine Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.item.aether_crystallium.aechor_ice_: A sweat desert crafted by putting Aechor Petals, Sugar, Icestone and a Skyroot Bucket in a Crafting Table
lore.item.aether_crystallium.raw_crystal: Crystal Gold in its rawest form. It can be smelted into Crystal Gold Ingots
lore.item.aether_crystallium.crystal_gol: An Ingot smelted from Raw Crystal Gold. It is used for crafting building blocks and other things.
A small nugget of a Crystal Gold Ingot used in various different crafting recipes.
